Translations.Text: Budʹ-yaka spilʹnota shcho vvazhaye bude bezsumnivno nahorodzhena dlya toho, shchob vvazhaty. Napryklad, lyudy Jonah: koly vony vvazhaly, my relieved prynyzhuyuchyy retribution vony strazhdaly u tse svit, ta my zrobyly yim kvituchym
Maly vashoho Lorda willed, vsi lyudy na zemli by poviryly. Vy zakhochete do syly lyudy staty viruyuchamy
Niyaka dusha ne mozhe poviryty krim u vidpovidnosti do BOZHOHO bude. Dlya Vin rozmishchuye proklʹon na tsi khto vidmovlyayutʹsya zrozumity
Kazhutʹ, "Dyvlyatʹsya na vsi znaky u nebi ta zemli." Vsi dokazy ta vsi poperedzhennya mozhutʹ nikoly ne dopomohty lyudyam kotrym vyrishyly disbelieve
vony Mozhutʹ ochikuvaty za vynyatkom doli yikhnikh koleh ranishe? Skazhitʹ, "Tilʹky chekayete, ta, razom z vamy, ya takozh chekayu
My ostatochno ryatuyemo nashykh kur'yeriv ta tsi khto vvazhayutʹ. Tse - nash nezminnyy zakon shcho my ryatuyemo viruyuchiv

Kazhutʹ, "O lyudy, yakshcho vy mayete budʹ-yakyy sumniv vidnosno moyeyi relihiyi, ya ne obozhnyuyu shcho vy obozhnyuyete bilya BOHA. YA obozhnyuyu BOHA yedynyy; khto prypynytʹ vashi zhyttya. YA nakazuyusʹ shchob buty viruyuchyy
ya buv nakazanyy: "Utrymayte sebe prysvyachenyy do relihiyi monotheism; vy ne budete idol praktyky obozhnyuyete
Vy ne budete obozhnyuvaty bilya BOHA shcho volodiye niyakoyu potuzhnistyu do vyhody vy abo shkoda vy. Yakshcho vy, vy budete porushnyk
